assure.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to tell someone that something will definitely happen or is definitely true so that they are less worried
assure.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The document is genuine, I can assure you.
Her doctor has assured us that she’ll be fine.
The dealer had assured me of its quality.
assure.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to make something certain to happen or to be achieved
assure.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Excellent reviews have assured the film’s success.
A win on Saturday will assure them of promotion to Division One.
